titleStmt.title: Blues lyric poetry [Electronic resource] : an anthology / Michael Taft

availability.licence: Distributed by the University of Oxford under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.

availability.p: Available for non-commercial use only with prior permission of the depositor and on condition that this header is included in its entirety with any copy distributed

notesStmt.note: Mode of access: Offline. Application to OTA
Title proper taken from electronic text

seriesStmt.p: Garland reference library of the humanities ; 361

Publication based on OTA text: Taft, Michael, 1947- . -- Blues lyric poetry : a concordance. -- New York ; London : Garland, 1984. -- 3 v. -- (Garland reference library of the humanities ; 362). -- "This volume is one of a series of contextual concordances published...under the general editorship of Michael J. Preston"--Verso. -- ISBN 0824092368

Publication based on OTA text: Taft, Michael, 1947- . -- The lyrics of race record blues, 1920-1942 : a semantic approach to the structural analysis of a formulaic system. -- Thesis -- Memorial University of Newfoundland. -- St. John’s : University Press, 1977
Publication based on OTA text: Taft, Michael, 1947- . -- “Willie McTell's rules of rhyme : a brief excursion into blues phonetics” in Southern Folklore Quarterly 24 (1978) : 53-71
